snippet.title: Edge of Memories - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Introducing Edge of Memories, a new JRPG from Nacon and developer Midgar Studio that's being worked on by decorated team, including Chrono Trigger composer Yasunori Mitsda, NieR lyricist Emi Evans, Xenoblade Chronicles character designer Raita Kazama, and Final Fantasy XV combat designer Mitsuru Yokoyama. It's the sequel to 2021's Edge of Eternity.
